title: Add OS tracking, connection instructions, and plan management with expiration dates

requirements.text: Add operating system field (Windows or Ubuntu) to the client record data model in the backend, storing it as a variant type with options for Windows and Ubuntu

quotes: cadastrar o sistema da máquina se é windows ou ubuntu

acceptanceCriteria: Backend ClientRecord type includes an OS field with Windows/Ubuntu options
OS field is persisted and retrieved correctly in CRUD operations

requirements.text: Add plan expiration date field to the client record data model in the backend, storing it as a timestamp or date value

quotes: validade dele, que deve também ser definida no cadastro do cliente no painel de administração

acceptanceCriteria: Backend ClientRecord type includes a planExpirationDate field
Expiration date is persisted and retrieved correctly in CRUD operations

requirements.text: Update the client registration form in the admin panel to include a dropdown for selecting operating system (Windows or Ubuntu) and a date picker for setting the plan expiration date

quotes: cadastrar o sistema da máquina se é windows ou ubuntu
validade dele, que deve também ser definida no cadastro do cliente no painel de administração

acceptanceCriteria: ClientRegistrationForm component includes OS dropdown with Windows/Ubuntu options
ClientRegistrationForm component includes date picker for plan expiration
Form submits OS and expiration date to backend when creating new clients

requirements.text: Update the client edit modal in the admin panel to allow editing the operating system and plan expiration date fields

quotes: cadastrar o sistema da máquina se é windows ou ubuntu
validade dele, que deve também ser definida no cadastro do cliente

acceptanceCriteria: ClientEditModal component includes OS dropdown field
ClientEditModal component includes date picker for plan expiration
Modal saves updated OS and expiration date to backend

requirements.text: Display SSH connection instructions on the client dashboard when the operating system is Ubuntu, including a mini explanation with the command format and connection steps

quotes: caso seja Ubuntu tenha uma mini explicação sobre como conectar ao ssh

acceptanceCriteria: Client dashboard shows SSH instructions card when OS is Ubuntu
Instructions include SSH command format using the VPS IP and username
Instructions include clear step-by-step connection guidance

requirements.text: Display RDP connection instructions on the client dashboard when the operating system is Windows, including a mini explanation with the connection steps and how to use Remote Desktop

quotes: se for windows como conectar ao rdp

acceptanceCriteria: Client dashboard shows RDP instructions card when OS is Windows
Instructions include how to open Remote Desktop Connection
Instructions include step-by-step guidance using the VPS IP and credentials

requirements.text: Display the client's plan name and expiration date in the user profile section on the client dashboard, showing the expiration date in a readable format

quotes: no perfil do usuário apareça o plano e a validade dele

acceptanceCriteria: Client dashboard profile section displays the plan name
Client dashboard profile section displays the plan expiration date
Expiration date is formatted in a user-friendly way (e.g., 'Valid until Jan 15, 2025')

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
Maintain single-actor architecture in backend with all logic in main.mo
Preserve existing authentication system and admin/client separation
nonGoals: Automated expiration date notifications or warnings
Automatic client account suspension based on expiration
Support for operating systems other than Windows and Ubuntu
VNC or other remote connection protocols beyond SSH and RDP
